title: Terraform Labs, Do Kwon Fail to Have Singapore Class-Action Suit Rejected: Report
description: The suit was filed in September 2022 by Julian Moreno Beltran and Douglas Gan on behalf of 375 others, who claim they lost a combined $57 million.

title: Bitcoin Rises to $38.8K for the First Time Since May 2022
description: Overall crypto market capitalization is at its highest level since May 2022 with nearly $400 billion added since the start of October.

title: Starknet token distribution not yet finalized, despite speculation over portal screenshots
description:
The Starknet Foundation is warning community members to be on the lookout for scams relating to circulating screenshots of early iterations of a token distribution portal.

The Starknet Foundation has moved quickly to quash speculation around screenshots of early iterations of a distribution portal for the upcoming launch of its native SRTK ecosystem token.

Information shared with Cointelegraph ahead of an announcement on X (formerly Twitter) outlined that the Foundation is still developing plans to distribute the token to certain users, contributors, and investors. The Ethereum layer 2 scaling network previously outlined initial plans for the Starknet token design in July 2022.

We have seen that a preview of an iteration of a possible provisions portal has been shared on social media.

— Starknet Foundation (@StarknetFndn) December 1, 2023

Screenshots disseminated online have been labeled “draft plans that are still under development.” A spokesperson from StarkWare told Cointelegraph that details of official criteria and the provision mechanism of STRK tokens will be shared once the company has finalized them:

“The cut-off for any criteria used to determine who may receive tokens or how many tokens is in the past, and no actions or activity now can impact eligibility in any way.”

The company also stressed that community members should be acutely aware of scams that will look to take advantage of any uncertainty around the STRK token distribution.

Related: Ethereum L2 Starknet aims to decentralize core components of its scaling network

A number of different X users reposted screenshots of the early iterations of the Starknet token provisions portal and further information that alluded to certain requirements to receive STRK tokens.

Read more

title: MicroStrategy’s latest Bitcoin purchase boosts shareholder value
description:
Quick Take MicroStrategy’s recent acquisition of an additional 16,130 Bitcoin has boosted its total Bitcoin ownership to 174,530 BTC. This latest Bitcoin acquisition ranks as MicroStrategy’s third-largest purchase since the implementation of its Bitcoin standard strategy. The post MicroStrategy’s latest Bitcoin purchase boosts shareholder value appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Crypto con artist’s luck puns out – Here is his 63-month prison term
description: Esteban Cabrera Da Corte, a 27-year-old Miami resident who oversaw an extensive crypto fraud operation, was sentenced yesterday to 63 months in federal prison. He pled guilty earlier this year to charges stemming from a conspiracy from 2020 to early 2021 in which he illegally obtained crypto coins and then tricked banks into undoing the ... Read more

title: Polkadot’s Web3 Foundation to put $1m in U.S. tokenized treasury bills, DOT jumps 6%
description: The Web3 Foundation, dedicated to the development of the Polkadot ecosystem, has announced a $1 million seed investment in tokenized treasury bills. In an X post on Nov. 29, 2023 the Web3 Foundation unveiled plans to put $1 million in…

title: Ronaldo Contemplating Settlement to Avoid Binance Lawsuit Trial
description:

title: Altcoins on the Verge of a 2016-Style Rally, Says Crypto Analyst
description:
